title: Bug 102623: Image cannot be refreshed after re-importing
description: When attempting to import a new image into the layout, the image is not being refreshed and the original image continues to be displayed.
OB: Upon importing the new image 'image1.jpg' into the layout again:
EB: The expected result is that the new image is displayed. However, the actual result is that the original image is still displayed.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Import the image 'image1.jpg' into the layout.
2. Repeat step 1 and attempt to import the same image 'image1.jpg' again.
3. Observe that the original image is still displayed, instead of the newly imported image.
